title: pati avanE
sahitya:
pati avanE ulagam padinAngin pati avanE umai bhAgam piriyAda


anupallavi

  vidhiyuDan mAl uyar viNNodu maNNum viyandaDi muditEDi ayarndiDa vaLarnda nam


caraNam    tandaiyum tAyumilAt-tani deivam saccidAnanda vaDivamAm deivam
sakala jIva kODigaLai ATTi vaittut-tAnum Ananda naTamADum pashu-
